description: Makes a voice or video call to a specific person using the selected media and device.

device.description: The device to be used for the call. Can be phone, PC, tablet, or laptop.

personName.description: The name of the person to call. For example: Mom, surya, sundaram, Dr. Mehta, etc.

callMedia.description: The platform or medium to use for the call. Examples: SIM, WhatsApp, Instagram etc.
